body: Fine or imprisonment with bail. You must spend 1/2 the value of the contact's gear (see Table 14—9: NPC Gear on page 454 of the Core Rulebook) to rectify this situation; otherwise, you lose the contact, all current and future contacts have their Trust scores lowered by 2 with you, and the DC of any of your future attempts to raise the Trust scores of contacts increases by 5.
name: Critical Failure
